This real estate video tour feed is presented by www.AgentCasts.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Amy Davis AZ Real Estate Marketing Video Series
channel.itunes:summary: As an active Realtor serving the Phoenix Metro Valley, I strive for excellence and quality service to better serve all of my clients. Weather your buying or selling a home, it is important to be informed and protected throughout the entire process. As your realtor I work hard to achieve the results that you deserve!!! Call me today for a consultation! 480.747.3180

item.title: 29671 N Balmoral Place Queen Creek, AZ 85243

For more information contact Amy Davis by phone at 480.747.3180, by email at amy@blhg.net, or visit her online at http://www.c21ran.com.
item.itunes:subtitle: A real estate video tour featuring 29671 N Balmoral Place Queen Creek, AZ 85243. For more information contact Amy Davis by phone at 480.747.3180, by email at amy@blhg.net, or visit her online at http://www.c21ran.com.
item.itunes:summary:
A real estate video tour featuring 29671 N Balmoral Place Queen Creek, AZ 85243.
3 Bedrooms, 2 Baths, MLS# 2940288.
This Breathtaking 3 bedroom 2 bath home is beautifully landscaped and boasts serious curb appeal, making it stand out from the rest. An Inviting & warm entry welcomes everyone who passes through the doors.
From the moment you enter this spacious home, you will immediately sense its openness and brightness. The extremely clean kitchen comes with all the extras... plenty of cabinetry, all newer top of the line appliances, and an RO System. It's a real chefs delight! The kitchen was even built with enough space for a 6-8 person dinning table. The spacious family room offers enough room to comfortably fit even the most over sized furniture.
You will be welcomed into the master bedroom through beautiful French Doors which lead to a generously sized living area. There is Neutral tile flooring in both bathrooms as well as in the kitchen to compliment any style of decor. The lovely and spacious backyard is truly an Arizona Oasis!!! The Mature Desert landscaping is low maintenance and is tastefully manicured. This home even features a Pebble tech pool with a relaxing waterfall... Relax, Listen & Enjoy!!!
Located on a beautiful Golf Course, this property allows you to enjoy playing all year round. You can even Step into the Club House for a cool drink or sit down to 4 star dinning after a golf game! Don't wait any longer... Call Amy Davis for more info at 480.747.3180! She looks forward to hearing from you!
For more information contact Amy Davis by phone at 480.747.3180, by email at amy@blhg.net, or visit her online at http://www.c21ran.com.
